name: Asteroids: Revenge
description:
Asteroids Revenge: Your planet is under attack by an asteroid swarm! It's up to you and your ship-to save the planet!

Controls

Hold the left mouse button in the direction you would like to move

Space to shoot

Enter to restart

The Team

Programming: RoboMarchello, ScriptLine Studios

SFX/Music: AdamAudio

Code

All code can be found on our GitHub

This game was made for the Pygame Community Summer Team Jam
